issue.title: [CF 1496] Sound notifications keep triggering when changing/entering maps.
issue.body:
As title.
Couldn't find any other thread on this matter.
Am I the only one who has this issue ?

 

It was a Sound with On Conditions (Charges/Cooldown time), how do I prevent this from triggering?


> Posted by CurseForge user shinjiat | Imported from CurseForge issue #1496 | Raw

comments.body:
Post the export string of the icon that is causing the issues.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

No response received.
